name: SkilledTradesBC Plumber IP Exam Blueprint (2023 RSOS)
source: SkilledTradesBC – Inter-provincial examinations – Tasks and related number of questions (Based on 2023 RSOS)

tasks.title: Performs safety-related functions
Uses and maintains tools and equipment
Organizes work
Performs routine trade activities
Uses communication and mentoring techniques
Prepares tube, tubing and pipe
Joins tube, tubing and pipe
Installs, tests and services sewers
Installs, tests and services sewage treatment systems
Installs, tests and services interior DWV systems
Installs, tests and services water service
Installs, tests and services potable water distribution systems
Installs, tests and services private water pressure systems
Installs, tests and services plumbing fixtures and appliances
Installs, tests and services water treatment systems
Installs, tests and services low-pressure steam systems (Not Common Core)
Installs, tests and services piping and components for hydronic systems
Installs, tests and services hydronic heating and cooling equipment
Installs, tests and services process piping systems
Installs, tests and services potable water fire protection systems (Not Common Core)
Installs, tests and services other specialized systems
